subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] 5Y radio?
author: Tarot Messages
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_005B_01C8635B.0EDBF8D0
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Hi!

I'm a C2C listener although I miss the commericals since I usually can=
't make the broadcast time, so I download the podcasts. I *think* you might=
 be talking about this:

http://www.ccrane.com/radios/wifi-radios/acoustic-=
energy-wi-fi-internet-radio.aspx

It has on the bottom on the page about li=
stening to C2C so they may have had their commerical on the station.

Heath=
er

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Ron Lederer 
  To: evp 
  Sent:=
 Wednesday, January 30, 2008 2:47 PM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] 5Y radio?


  Rec=
ently I heard part of a commercial on C2C about a radio called 5Y or Y5 or =
something like that.  Anyway, the commercial was balleyhooing something abo=
ut getting the best reception in the world on at least these five stations.=
   Then again, maybe I dreamed it.  But I do think it aired on coast 2 coas=
t and probably is on that station alot.  I don't get C2C here on a regular =
basis.  Sooo, my question is, does anyone know about a special radio system=
...maybe it is satellite generated...and, how would that fit with our work.=
  Ron L



----------------------------------------------------------------=
--------------
  Never miss a thing. Make Yahoo your homepage.
